pages.title: DenLiner Ikazuchi
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chance to find $(l:den_o/mobs/ryutaros)Ryutaros$(/l) inside$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket_gun)Rider Ticket Ryutaros$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (16%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/rider_tickets#rider_ticket)Rider Tickets$(/l) (53%)
